code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import AppContext from'../AppContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Insights(){const{categories}=useContext(AppContext);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bank_account_container",style:{flexWrap:"wrap"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"transaction_headers",style:{gridTemplateColumns:"3fr 2fr",width:"100%"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:"Category"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:"Amount"})]}),Object.entries(categories).map(_ref=>{let[key,value]=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{width:"100%"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"transaction_rows",style:{gridTemplateColumns:"3fr 2fr"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{id:"transaction_name",children:key}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{id:"Price",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{id:"DollaBill",children:"$ "}),value]})]})},key);})]});}export default Insights;
